questionText: Which of the following can not be NULL?
answerOptions: A column value in a table

questionText: What is not a table joining algorithm in query processing?
How differ Static Hashing from Extendible Hashing?
answerOptions: Does not create long overflow chains
Allow fixed number of primary buckets to store the records
Primary nodes will delete if empty
Performance is not affected when file is growing
correctAnswer: Allow fixed number of primary buckets to store the records

questionText: Assume you have 9 buffer pages to sort 120 pages in a file. How many passes we get in external merge sort?

What is co-dependent types in Object Relational Model?
answerOptions: Cycle of references between two types
Conflicts between two types of data objects
Cycle of references between two tables
correctAnswer: Conflicts between two types of data objects

questionText: Consider a disk with sector size of 512 bytes, 3000 tracks per surface, 40 sectors per track and five single-side platters.Each disk block spans two sectors. The disk platters rotate at 7200 rpm (revolutions per minute). Compute the capacity of the disk in blocks?
Which one is incorrect on Indexing?
answerOptions: Dense index facilitates to fast searching
Primary index has a key field
Secondary index has a key field
Used to optimize the performance of access the data
correctAnswer: Secondary index has a key field

questionText: Which combination is true?
answerOptions: B+ tree file - Dynamic tree index
Heap file - Records inserted to the begin of the file
Hashed file - Good for equality selection
correctAnswer: Heap file - Records inserted to the begin of the file
